T02D1685:6b-1: t'a re de bi sto tram ae ka bi sham ti ka s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02D1685:6b-3: lha mo sgrol ma'i bstod pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D1685:6b-4: rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1685:6b-5: phyag 'tshal sgrol ma myur ma dpa' mo //
T02D1685:6b-6: spyan ni skad cig glog dang 'dra ma //
T02D1685:6b-7: 'jig rten gsum mgon chu skyes zhal gyi //
T02D1685:6b-8: ge sar bye ba las ni byung ma //
T02D1685:6b-9: de la dang por re zhig bcom ldan 'das ma
T02D1685:6b-10: sgrol ma nam mkha'i dkyil na padma dmar po'i steng
T02D1685:6b-11: na bzhugs pa sku mdog dmar mo me lta bu'i
T02D1685:6b-13: zhal gcig la spyan gnyis ma phyag brgyad pa'o //
T02D1685:7a-0: phyag dang po gnyis sgrog par bzhengs pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan @7a * //
T02D1685:7a-2: / de'i 'og ma gnyis kyis mda' dang gzhu gzhan la 'phen pa thugs kar bkang ba /
T02D1685:7a-3: g-yas kyi gsum pa na 'khor lo //
T02D1685:7a-5: g-yon gyi gsum pa na dung /
T02D1685:7a-6: bzhi pa na zhags pa bsnams pa /
T02D1685:7a-7: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1685:7a-8: 'phags ma sgrol ma myur zhing rab tu dpa' ba
T02D1685:7a-9: zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs le'u dang po rdzogs so
T02D1685:7a-11: / // / phyag 'tshal ston ka'i zla ba kun tu //
T02D1685:7a-12: gang ba brgya ni brtsegs pa'i zhal ma //
T02D1685:7a-13: skar ma stong phrag tshogs pa rnams kyis //
T02D1685:7a-14: rab tu phye ba'i 'od rab 'bar ma //
T02D1685:7a-15: de la dang por re zhig ston ka'i zla ba
T02D1685:7a-16: ltar dkar ba'i sgrol ma dkar mo zhal gsum phyag
T02D1685:7a-17: bcu gnyis ma / zhal gsum ni rtsa zhal dkar ba /
T02D1685:7a-18: g-yas sngo zhing g-yon ser ba'o //
T02D1685:7a-19: phyag dang po gnyis mnyam par gzhag pa /
T02D1685:7a-20: g-yas gnyis pa kha tv'am ga / gsum pa na 'khor lo /
T02D1685:7a-23: drug pa na me tog gi phreng ba'o //
T02D1685:7a-24: g-yon gyi gnyis pa na ril ba spyi blugs /
T02D1685:7a-28: drug pa na po ti bsnams pa'o //
T02D1685:7a-29: 'phags ma sgrol ma ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar
T02D1685:7a-30: ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs le'u gnyis pa rdzogs
T02D1685:7a-32: / phyag 'tshal gser sngo chu nas skyes kyi //
T02D1685:7a-33: padma phyag ni rnam par brgyan ma //
T02D1685:7a-34: sbyin pa brtson 'grus dka' thub zhi ba //
T02D1685:7a-35: bzod pa bsam gtan spyod yul nyid ma //
T02D1685:7a-36: rje btsun ma sgrol ma gser gyi mdog can zhal gcig phyag bcu ma /
T02D1685:7a-37: sna tshogs padma'i steng gi nyi ma la gnas ma /
T02D1685:7a-38: phyag g-yas kyi dang po na phreng ba thugs kar 'dzin pa /
T02D1685:7a-40: gsum pa na mda' 'phen par mdzad pa /
T02D1685:7a-43: g-yon gyi dang po na dar dpyangs /
T02D1685:7a-44: gnyis pa na zhags pa gsum pa na padma /
T02D1685:7a-46: lnga pa na gzhu bsnams pa'o //
T02D1685:7a-47: de yang rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1685:7a-48: 'phags ma sgrol ma gser mdog can gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba'i le'u gsum pa rdzogs so /
T02D1685:7b-0: // / phyag 'tshal de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug @7b tor ;
T02D1685:7b-1: / mtha' yas rnam par rgyal bar spyod ma //
T02D1685:7b-2: ma lus pha rol phyin pa thob pa'i //
T02D1685:7b-3: rgyal ba'i sras kyis shin tu brtan ma //
T02D1685:7b-4: padma ser po dang zla ba'i dkyil na sems dpa'i
T02D1685:7b-5: skyil mo krung gis brtan par bzhugs pa'i rje btsun
T02D1685:7b-8: g-yas dang po mchog sbyin pa /
T02D1685:7b-10: g-yon dang po na ril ba spyi blugs /
T02D1685:7b-11: gnyis pa na dbyu gu bsnams pa'o //
T02D1685:7b-12: 'phags ma sgrol ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor
T02D1685:7b-13: rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi
T02D1685:7b-14: le'u ste bzhi pa rdzogs so /
T02D1685:7b-17: // / phyag 'tshal tutt'a re h'um yi ges //
T02D1685:7b-18: 'dod dang phyogs dang nam mkha' gang ma //
T02D1685:7b-19: 'jig rten gsum po zhabs kyis mnan te //
T02D1685:7b-20: lus pa med par 'gugs par nus ma //
T02D1685:7b-21: rje btsun ma sku mdog ser mo //
T02D1685:7b-22: zla ba'i gdan la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D1685:7b-25: g-yon padma ser po bsnams pa'o //
T02D1685:7b-26: 'phags ma sgrol ma h'um gi sgra rab tu sgrogs
T02D1685:7b-27: ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste lnga
T02D1685:7b-29: / phyag 'tshal brgya byin me lha tshangs pa //
T02D1685:7b-30: rlung lha sna tshogs dbang phyug mchod ma //
T02D1685:7b-31: 'byung po ro langs dri za rnams dang //
T02D1685:7b-32: gnod sbyin tshogs kyis mdun nas bstod ma //
T02D1685:7b-34: padma dmar po dang nyi ma'i gdan la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D1685:7b-36: g-yas kyi dang po rdo rje /
T02D1685:7b-38: g-yon gyi dang po sdigs mdzub /
T02D1685:7b-39: gnyis pa na zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D1685:7b-40: 'phags ma sgrol ma 'jig rten gsum las rnam par
T02D1685:7b-41: rgyal ma zhas bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste
T02D1685:7b-44: // / phyag 'tshal trat ces bya dang phat kyis //
T02D1685:7b-46: g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang zhabs kyis mnan te //
T02D1685:7b-49: padma ser po dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la g-yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa /
T02D1685:7b-50: na bza' ser po mnabs pa /
T02D1685:7b-51: rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02D1685:7b-52: rkang gdub la sogs pa dang ldan pa /
T02D1685:8a-0: @8a * // zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma dbu skra gyen du brdzes shing sbrul gyis brgyan pa /
T02D1685:8a-3: g-yon dang po skye gnas kyi steng na zhags pa bsnams pa /
T02D1685:8a-4: gnyis pa brkyang ste sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o //
T02D1685:8a-5: 'phags ma sgrol ma gzhan 'joms ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bdun pa rdzogs so /
T02D1685:8a-7: // / phyag 'tshal tu res 'jigs pa chen mo //
T02D1685:8a-8: bdud kyi dpa' bo rnam par 'joms ma //
T02D1685:8a-9: chu skyes zhal ni khro gnyer ldan mdzad //
T02D1685:8a-10: dgra bo thams cad ma lus gsod ma //
T02D1685:8a-11: rje btsun ma gser gyi mdog can zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma /
T02D1685:8a-12: padma dmar po dang zla ba'i steng na chu srin la skyil mo krung phyed pas bzhugs pa /
T02D1685:8a-13: g-yas dang po na shing mya ngan med pa'i yal ga bzung ba /
T02D1685:8a-14: gnyis pa na rin po che bsnams shing mchog stsol ba /
T02D1685:8a-16: gnyis pa na bum pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D1685:8a-17: 'phags ma sgrol ma bdud thams cad 'joms shing /
T02D1685:8a-18: dbang mchog ster bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1685:8a-20: // / phyag 'tshal dkon mchog gsum mtshon phyag rgya'i //
T02D1685:8a-21: sor mos thugs kar rnam par brgyan ma //
T02D1685:8a-22: ma lus phyogs kyi 'khor los brgyan pa'i //
T02D1685:8a-23: rang gi 'od kyi tshogs rnams 'khrugs ma //
T02D1685:8a-24: rje btsun ma padma r'a ga'i mdog can /
T02D1685:8a-25: padma dmar po dang zla ba'i steng na bzhugs pa /
T02D1685:8a-27: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan ma /
T02D1685:8a-28: phyag dang po gnyis rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D1685:8a-29: dang po'i phyag rgya lta bu'o //
T02D1685:8a-30: g-yas gnyis pas gar byed pa /
T02D1685:8a-31: g-yon gnyis pa shing mya ngan med pa'i yal ga
T02D1685:8a-32: 'dzin pa'i phyag gis sems can thams cad la rin
T02D1685:8a-33: po che'i char rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1685:8a-34: 'phags ma sgrol ma mchog stsol bzhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste dgu pa rdzogs so /
T02D1685:8a-36: // / phyag 'tshal rab tu dga' bas brjid pa'i //
T02D1685:8a-37: dbu rgyan 'od kyi phreng bas spel ma //
T02D1685:8a-38: bzhad pa rab bzhad tutt'a re yis //
T02D1685:8a-39: bdud dang 'jig rten dbang du mdzad ma //
T02D1685:8b-0: rje btsun ma dmar mo padma dmar po zla @8b ba'i steng na rol pas bzhugs pa /
T02D1685:8b-2: phyag dang po gnyis spyi bor rab tu dga' ba'i phyag rgya bcings pa /
T02D1685:8b-3: g-yas gnyis pa na ral gri'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa /
T02D1685:8b-4: g-yon gnyis pa na shing mya ngan med pa'i yal ga bzung ba'o //
T02D1685:8b-5: 'phags ma sgrol ma mya ngan thams cad sel bar
T02D1685:8b-6: byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste
T02D1685:8b-9: // / phyag 'tshal sa gzhi skyong ba'i tshogs rnams //
T02D1685:8b-10: thams cad 'gugs par nus pa nyid ma //
T02D1685:8b-11: khro gnyer g-yo ba'i yi ge h'um gis //
T02D1685:8b-12: phongs pa thams cad rnam par sgrol ma //
T02D1685:8b-13: rje btsun ma mun pa'i mdog can nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D1685:8b-14: 'khor gyi steng na padma la zhabs g-yas brkyang ba'i
T02D1685:8b-17: phyogs mtshams brgyad nas gza' brgyad g-yas na bsnams pa'i lcags kyus 'gugs pa /
T02D1685:8b-18: phyag g-yon pas rol pa'i zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D1685:8b-19: 'phags ma sgrol ma 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs shing
T02D1685:8b-20: phongs ba thams cad sel ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub
T02D1685:8b-21: thabs kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa rdzogs so /
T02D1685:8b-23: // / phyag 'tshal zla ba'i dum bus dbu brgyan //
T02D1685:8b-24: brgyan pa thams cad shin tu 'bar ma /
T02D1685:8b-25: ral pa'i khrod nas 'od dpag med las //
T02D1685:8b-26: rtag par shin tu 'od ni mdzad ma //
T02D1685:8b-27: rje btsun ma 'phags ma gser gyi mdog can /
T02D1685:8b-28: sna tshogs padma'i steng na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D1685:8b-30: g-yas dang po na rtse gsum pa gnyis pa na lcags kyu /
T02D1685:8b-33: g-yon dang po na rin po che thugs kar bsnams pa /
T02D1685:8b-36: bzhi pas bum pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D1685:8b-37: 'phags ma sgrol ma bkra shis thams cad sbyin pa
T02D1685:8b-38: zhes bya ba'i sgrab thabs kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis
T02D1685:8b-40: / phyag 'tshal ba skal ba'i mtha' ma'i me ltar //
T02D1685:8b-41: 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i dbus na gnas ma //
T02D1685:8b-42: g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum kun nas bskor dga'i //
T02D1685:8b-43: dgra yi dpung ni rnam par 'joms ma //
T02D1685:9a-1: padma dmar po'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od
T02D1685:9a-2: zer dang bcas pa la g-yas brkyang bas gnas pa
T02D1685:9a-4: smin ma dang mtshu gyen du rtsol bas lta ba /
T02D1685:9a-5: g-yas dang po na ral gri //
T02D1685:9a-8: gnyis pa na gzhu bsnams pa'o //
T02D1685:9a-9: 'phags ma sgrol ma yongs su smin par byed pa
T02D1685:9a-10: zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu gsum
T02D1685:9a-12: / phyag 'tshal sa gzhi'i ngos la phyag gi //
T02D1685:9a-13: mthil gyis bsnun cing zhabs kyis brdung ma /
T02D1685:9a-14: khro gnyer can mdzad yi ge h'um gis /
T02D1685:9a-15: rim pa bdun po rnams ni 'gems ma //
T02D1685:9a-16: rje bcun ma sku mdog nag mo nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D1685:9a-17: 'khor gyi steng na padma dmar ser la g-yas brkyang
T02D1685:9a-18: ba'i gar gyis yid gas mnan cing bzhugs pa /
T02D1685:9a-19: zhal gsum la spyan gsum mnga' ba'i rtsa ba'i zhal nag po /
T02D1685:9a-22: phyag drug pa khro gnyer dang ldan zhing zhal dang smin ma bsdus pa can /
T02D1685:9a-23: mi'i rgyu ma zhal du gsol zhing mi mgo'i cod pan can /
T02D1685:9a-24: thod pa'i do shal dang ldan pa /
T02D1685:9a-25: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs mnabs pa /
T02D1685:9a-27: phyogs dang mtshams bzhir myu gu 'dzin pa /
T02D1685:9a-28: phyag g-yas dang po ral gri /
T02D1685:9a-31: g-yon dang po khrag gis bkang pa'i thod pa /
T02D1685:9a-33: gsum pa na mgo bo bsnams pa'o //
T02D1685:9a-34: 'phags ma sgrol ma 'gugs pa'i khro mo zhes bya
T02D1685:9a-35: ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa rdzogs
T02D1685:9a-37: / phyag 'tshal bde ma dge ma zhi ma //
T02D1685:9a-38: mya ngan 'das zhi spyod yul nyid ma /
T02D1685:9a-39: sv'a h'a aom dang yang dag ldan ma //
T02D1685:9a-40: sdig pa chen mo 'joms pa nyid ma //
T02D1685:9a-41: rje btsun ma dkar mo zhal gcig phyag drug ma /
T02D1685:9a-42: padma dkar po'i steng na zla ba la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D1685:9a-43: g-yas dang pos phreng ba thugs kar bsnams pa /
T02D1685:9a-47: gnyis pa na ril ba spyi blugs /
T02D1685:9a-48: gsum pa po ti bsnams pa'o //
T02D1685:9b-0: 'phags ma @9b sgrol ma zhi ba chen mo zhes
T02D1685:9b-1: bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa
T02D1685:9b-2: rdzogs so // / phyag 'tshal kun nas bas skor ba dga' ba'i //
T02D1685:9b-3: dgra yi lus ni rab tu 'gems ma //
T02D1685:9b-4: yi ge bcu po'i ngag ni bkod pa'i //
T02D1685:9b-5: rig pa h'um las sgrol ma nyid ma //
T02D1685:9b-6: rje btsun ma dmar mo zhal gcig spyan gsum ma /
T02D1685:9b-8: padma dmar ser gyi steng na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D1685:9b-9: g-yas thugs kar rtse gsum pa bsnams pa /
T02D1685:9b-10: g-yon snying po dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1685:9b-11: 'phags ma sgrol ma chags pa 'joms ma zhes bya
T02D1685:9b-12: ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa rdzogs
T02D1685:9b-14: / phyag 'tshal tu re zhabs ni brdabs pas //
T02D1685:9b-15: h'um yig rnam pa'i sa bon nyid ma //
T02D1685:9b-16: ri rab manda ra dang 'bigs byed //
T02D1685:9b-17: 'jig rten gsum rnams g-yo ba nyid ma //
T02D1685:9b-18: rje btsun ma sku mdog dmar ser /
T02D1685:9b-20: padma dkar po'i steng na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D1685:9b-21: phyag gnyis kyis thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o //
T02D1685:9b-22: 'phags ma sgrol ma bde ba thams cad sgrub ba
T02D1685:9b-23: zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu bdun
T02D1685:9b-25: / phyag 'tshal lha yi mtsho yi rnam pa'i //
T02D1685:9b-26: ri dvags rtags can phyag na bsnams ma //
T02D1685:9b-27: t'a ra gnyis brjod phat kyi yi ges //
T02D1685:9b-28: dug rnams ma lus par ni sel ma //
T02D1685:9b-29: rje btsun ma dkar mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma /
T02D1685:9b-30: padma dkar po dang zla ba'i gdan la ngang pa'i
T02D1685:9b-31: steng na sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gi sa bzhugs
T02D1685:9b-32: pa / phyag dang po gnyis dga' ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa /
T02D1685:9b-33: g-yas gnyis pas mchog sbyin pa /
T02D1685:9b-34: g-yon pa snying po dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1685:9b-35: 'phags ma sgrol ma rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya
T02D1685:9b-36: ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa rdzogs
T02D1685:9b-37: so // / phyag 'tshal lha yi tshogs rnams rgyal po //
T02D1685:9b-38: lha dang mi 'am yis bsten ma //
T02D1685:9b-39: kun nas go cha dga' ba'i brjid kyis //
T02D1685:9b-40: rtsod dang rmi lam ngan pa sel ma /
T02D1685:10a-0: rje btsun ma dkar mo zhal @10a * //
T02D1685:10a-2: padma dkar po dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D1685:10a-3: 'od zer gyi phreng bas brgyan pa /
T02D1685:10a-4: phyag gnyis kyi thugs kar me'i snod bsnams pa'o //
T02D1685:10a-5: 'phags ma sgrol ma sdug bsngal thams cad bsreg pa
T02D1685:10a-6: zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu dgu
T02D1685:10a-8: / phyag 'tshal nyi ma zla brgyas pa'i //
T02D1685:10a-9: spyan gnyis po la 'od rab gsal ma //
T02D1685:10a-10: ha ra gnyis brjod tutt'a re yis //
T02D1685:10a-11: shin tu drag po'i rims ni sel ma //
T02D1685:10a-12: rje btsun ma dmar ser zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma /
T02D1685:10a-13: padma dmar po dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D1685:10a-14: phyag gnyis kyis gser gyi mdog can gyi bum pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D1685:10a-15: 'phags ma sgrol ma dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba
T02D1685:10a-16: zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste nyi shu
T02D1685:10a-18: / phyag 'tshal de nyid gsum rnams bkod pas //
T02D1685:10a-19: zhi ba'i mthu dang yang dag ldan ma //
T02D1685:10a-20: gdon dang ro langs gnod sbyin tshogs rnams //
T02D1685:10a-21: 'joms pa tu re'i rab mchog nyid ma //
T02D1685:10a-22: rje btsun ma dkar mo zhal gcig spyan gsum pa /
T02D1685:10a-24: khyu mchog gi steng na padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa /
T02D1685:10a-25: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs mnabs pa /
T02D1685:10a-27: g-yon rtse gsum pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D1685:10a-28: 'phags ma sgrol ma yongs su rdzogs par byed ma
T02D1685:10a-29: zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste nyi shu
T02D1685:10a-31: /'phags ma sgrol ma'i bstod pa nyi shu rtsa gcig
T02D1685:10a-32: pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba kha che'i pandi ta
T02D1685:10a-33: slob dpon nyi ma spabs pas mdzad pa rdzogs so
T02D1685:10a-34: // pandi ta manydzu shr'i dang bod kyi lo ts'a
T02D1685:10a-35: ba mal gyo blo gros grags pas bsgyur cing zhus
